The inner machinations of my mind are an enigma.
Too bad SpongeBob isn't here to enjoy SpongeBob not being here.
I Wumbo, You Wumbo, He / she Wumbo.
And who put the "hiya-hi-ho-K" in karate?
Welcome to the Salty Spittoon. How tough are ya?
I ate a bowl of nails for breakfast this morning... without any milk!
Aw, nuts! I'm out of nuts.
What? There is no Smitty Webenjagermanjensen.
With cheese, Mr. Squidward. With cheese.
My name is Henry Hart. I'm here about the job.
I'm going to blow a bubble.
I tried to tunnel through the wall to steal some breakfast and got stuck.
Yes, but tell us about Puerto Rico.
Looks like we have a situation...
I think I lost a noodle.
Now, let's go get some Chinese food.
And I'm Kid Danger... I'm here too!
I'm going to blow a bubble. I'm going to blow your mind.
I'm going to leave the bad teeth in ya mouth, and yank out the good ones!
Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family?
Can I get a ride to the comic book store?
Would you care for some tea?
If you're not number one, I can't go number two. But no pressure.
I wouldn't do that if I were you...
What are you doing in my room?
Looks like the joke's on you!
Has anybody seen the remote? My show's on!
If I had a heart, it would be swelling right now.
Do you want me to read your fortune?
I'm more than just a pretty face!
Usually, I'm impervious to human emotion, but...eeeeee!!
This sounds like a really bad idea, and I'm totally in!
We're not kung fu frogs. We're Ninja Turtles.
This is all kinds of wrong!
I don't wanna live in a world without pizza!
We're Ninjas. We move swiftly and silently.
Whoever controls the Wayne, controls the world.
Protect the Wayne and everyone in it.
That was fine. We're fine. Everything's fine!
That's what we have to find out.
My body is a mystery even to me.
You are the best friend ever!
No amount of ice cream trucks can keep us apart!
Mikey and Bunsen to the rescue!
This is a perfect mix of weird and awesome!
Excuse me, this spitting makes me dehydrated.
I'll stop you and your beast buddy if it's the last thing I do!
Miss Sassy is back in town.
Not if I have anything to do with it!
Welcome to the high life sweetie.
No one tells Alvin what to do.
I didn't listen to Theodore's rap song.
I have friends in very high places.
Who's da bomb? Simon's da bomb!
Next stop, Awesometown! Where rainbows and giggles wash your fears away.
You brought us to a town, full of GHOSTS?!
Watch out, cause here we come!

REALLY QUIT?
YOUR CARTOON WILL BE LOST!
